Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Blue Island
ShortDescription: WB 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Blue Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Blue Island.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 47th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
